actions.name: North Wind

cost.trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: The user freely uses Aurora Veil.

actions.name: North Wind
actions.description: Passive: The user is immune to negative effects from Snowy Weather.

actions.name: Aurora Veil
actions.description: Effect: For 3 Rounds, the user and its allies take half damage from damaging attacks. Aurora Veil may only be used in Snow Weather.

system.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: Connection - Aurora Veil. The user freely uses Aurora Veil.

Passive: The user is immune to negative effects from Snowy Weather.
